txt.en: 'Greetings, [placeholder]. Some of my livestock have wandered off and have not yet returned home. Might I trouble you with finding them in the surrounding fields and sending them back here?\n\n'I would usually do this myself, but since my farm-hands left I do not have the time with all my other duties. I would gladly compensate you for the help.'
Some of Ashnân's livestock have been left out in the fields, and he needs your help sending them back home. Find them near Burukíri and encourage them to return.
'I have been told that you found the animals and sent them home. I am grateful for your help. Please accept this for your troubles.'
Some of Ashnân's livestock have been left out in the fields, and he needs your help sending them back home.
You have found the livestock that wandered off and sent them back home to Burukíri. Return to Ashnân and make sure he knows.
